title: What is the best smart screen? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm not sure what is a smart screen. There are smartphones vs featurephones. The screen on a smartphone (and smart tablet) is touch sensitive and oleophobic made of ‘gorilla’ glass or sapphire but it is the electronics behind the glass that make it smart. Therefore the ‘best’ smart screen is a matter of subjective taste: Android vs Apple iOS
